message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9500. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate it, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay up to $8500 for it. Please let me know if this is within your range.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. While I appreciate your offer, I'm not able to go that low.  I'm willing to come down to $9000. This is still a great price considering the value of the product to you. Let me know if you're interested.

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $8750 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations. Looking forward to your response.
